pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimate Spatial Population Indices from Ecological Abundance Data // Compute relative or absolute population trends across space and time using predictions from models fitted to ecological population abundance data, as described in Knape (2025) doi:10.1016/j.ecolind.2025.113435. The package supports models fitted by 'mgcv' or 'brms', and draws from posterior predictive distributions.
